description:
Spare no comfort when it comes to a good night's sleep, this double mat puts 15cm of padding between you and the hard world. Separate valves let you inflate or deflate it by tiny amounts to tune it from extra-firm to super-soft. Vertical sidewalls with no rounded edges let you sprawl across every square inch of the surface.

  • Top fabric is honeycomb embossed for velvety softness against your skin
  • Open cell polyurethane foam provides self-inflation
  • Flat valve lets you release small amounts of air to fine-tune firmness
  • Valves sit flat against mat to protect them from damage
  • Rated for use to -57°C
  • Includes mini pump, stuff sack, repair kit, and instruction sheet
name: Exped Megamat Max 15 Duo Sleeping Pad - Unisex
